extDescription.message: A simple eye-dropper & color-picker tool allowing you to select color values from webpages.

closeAndExit.message: Close and Exit Color Pick Mode [esc]

buyRegisterTip.message: Click to Buy & Register a ColorPick License or Opt-in.

pickAgain.message: Pick Again (Lock/Unlock Mouse Picking) [enter key] (rMouse:toggle autocast)

bgPageUnavailable.message: Background Page Snapshot Not Responding - Please Try Again.

licenseExceeded.message: License may be in use on the maximum number of hosts.  Upgrading your license may resolve the issue... Launch upgrade webpage now?

licenseComError.message: Problem communicating with license server.  Make sure your firewall is open on port 80 or contact your system administrator.  Please try again soon!

inappComError.message: Temporary problem with this payment method (Check your Internet connectivity), please try again later, try the buy license key method, or contact the developer sam@vidsbee.com

showdefaults.message: You still need to press save, defaults are showing now.

loadsyncOptions.message: Sync Storage options have been loaded and Saved.

pickEveryTime.message: Start picking each time colorpick button is clicked

showPreviewInContentS.message: Show image preview near cursor while picking

ShowRGBHSL.message: Show RGB and HSL on page too

autocopyhex.message: Attempt auto-copy the hex to the clipboard

hasAgreedToLicense.message: Has agreed to license Terms of Use

disableRewriting.message: Disable URL rewriting of affiliate links

usageStatistics.message: Gather Usage Statistics (See Terms of Use)

shareClors.message: Color of the Day Statistics (See Terms of Use)
